resources.string:
Welcome to WikiData,

 WikiData contains three basic features:
 1)Weather
 2)Movies info
 3)ask anything

Weather,works on OpenWeathermap API(application programming interface) means it sends a get request to the OpenWeatherMap api and the API send back the usful info. in Weather app you will be provided with a edit text field and you have to type the name of city whose weather you want to check.


Movies info works on OMDB(open movies database) api,the api functioning is same as in the Weather app


In Ask anyhthing activity you can pass anything in the edittext. (ALL THE EDIT TEXT INPUTS MUST BE CORRECTLY SPELLED FOR EXPECTED OUTCOME )
